memberdef.argsstring: (lv_area_t *area_p, lv_coord_t x1, lv_coord_t y1, lv_coord_t x2, lv_coord_t y2)
memberdef.name: lv_area_set

detaileddescription.para:
Initialize an area
area_p
pointer to an area
x1
left coordinate of the area
y1
top coordinate of the area
x2
right coordinate of the area
y2
bottom coordinate of the area

Copy an area
dest
pointer to the destination area
src
pointer to the source area

Get the width of an area
area_p
pointer to an area
the width of the area (if x1 == x2 -> width = 1)

Get the height of an area
area_p
pointer to an area
the height of the area (if y1 == y2 -> height = 1)

Set the width of an area
area_p
pointer to an area
w
the new width of the area (w == 1 makes x1 == x2)

Set the height of an area
area_p
pointer to an area
h
the new height of the area (h == 1 makes y1 == y2)

Set the position of an area (width and height will be kept)
area_p
pointer to an area
x
the new x coordinate of the area
y
the new y coordinate of the area

Return with area of an area (x * y)
area_p
pointer to an area
size of area

Get the common parts of two areas
res_p
pointer to an area, the result will be stored her
a1_p
pointer to the first area
a2_p
pointer to the second area
false: the two area has NO common parts, res_p is invalid

Join two areas into a third which involves the other two
res_p
pointer to an area, the result will be stored here
a1_p
pointer to the first area
a2_p
pointer to the second area

Check if a point is on an area
a_p
pointer to an area
p_p
pointer to a point
radius
radius of area (e.g. for rounded rectangle)
false:the point is out of the area

Check if two area has common parts
a1_p
pointer to an area.
a2_p
pointer to an other area
false: a1_p and a2_p has no common parts

Check if an area is fully on an other
ain_p
pointer to an area which could be in 'aholder_p'
aholder_p
pointer to an area which could involve 'ain_p'
radius
radius of aholder_p (e.g. for rounded rectangle)
true: ain_p is fully inside aholder_p

Increment or decrement an area's size by a single amount
a_p
pointer to an area to grow
amount
amount to increment the area, or negative to decrement

memberdef.argsstring: (const lv_area_t *base, const lv_area_t *to_align, lv_align_t align, lv_point_t *res)
memberdef.name: lv_area_align

detaileddescription.para:
Align an area to an other
base
an are where the other will be aligned
to_align
the area to align
align
LV_ALIGN_...
res
x/y coordinates where to_align align area should be placed
